From sphere-eversion; I just cleaned it up slightly and submitted it.

Thank you! I renamed lemmas because they were in the `_root_` namespace without `chart` in their names.
bors d+

That's even nicer than my version; thanks for the review and the golf!
bors r+

What do you think about adding the following lemma somewhere in `Topology.Basic`?

```lean
lemma isOpen_iff_of_cover {ι} {f : ι → Set X} (ho : ∀ i, IsOpen (f i)) (hU : (⋃ i, f i) = univ) {s : Set X} :
    IsOpen s ↔ ∀ i, IsOpen (f i ∩ s)
```
That sounds like a good idea; will do so (not today any more).
Used that lemma in ChartedSpace: is clearer, but not much shorter.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: subset of a charted space is open iff each image in charts is
